item.title: Ryzen workstation build 2017
item.description: I’ve been waiting for so long, AMD RYZEN processors are here for some time and I was giving few months to vendors and community to settle down and release updates for their BIOSes, firmware and Linux drivers before I finally made my decision. My next machine for work is AMD RYZEN 1700, unbelievable value for the money! Eight cores, sixteen threads and only 65 watts with stock cooler that is silent and “cool” according to all reviews.
